Description: THE LAST AUCTION WINNER DID NOT PAY SO THIS IS BACK UP FOR BIDDING...THE ITEM MUSY BE PAID FOR WITHING 24 HRS OF THE END OF AUCTION OR THE ITEM WILL BE RE-LISTED... $60 SHIPPING IS FOR THE CONTIGUOUS USA ONLY. Up for auction is this very rare 2001 Epiphone Demon... Production was limited to only 1000 units worldwide, serial number for this one is U01051222. Body Color is metallic black and is in good condition having only one very small ding on the upper backside corner (see photo with ink pen tip comparison ). You will be hard-pressed to find one of these in nicer condition than this one AND It is rare to find one of these guitars with the original case which is included in the auction. The case does have it's fair share of scuffs, scrapes, dings and wear marks but it serves its purpose and all latches are in tack and properly working. The guitar has been set up by a local professional tech with fairly low action and no buzzing or fret out. It plays great! This guitar is from the hard to find E-series which was made in Korea with inspection/setup done in Nashville, TN. Epiphone only produced the Demon V between 2001 and 2002. It has a modified V-shaped solid hardwood body, with a shorter lower horn. The bolt on maple neck has a slim-taper profile,Indianrosewood fingerboard with a satin finish. Has a tune-o-matic bridge with strings through body, and two E-series Ultra-Hot humbucking pickups (neck pickup DC resistance: 12 k, bridge pickup DC resistance:16 k). This Demon is the E-Series take on a classic Randy Rhoads V, and is from the Hard Body Series. Here is your chance to get a guitar that very few other collectors have. It will be packed and shipped with the greatest of care. Please do not hesitate to ask questions. If you would like more photos just ask and I will make sure you get them. Thanks... purpleshelly30 Specs below are from the Epiphone Website. Pickup selector controls 3-way selector switch Tone controls 1 tone control Volume controls 1 volume control Pickups configuration 2 humbucker pickups Number of strings 6 strings Scale length 24.75 inches scale-length Body style V shaped body Bridge tune-o-matic bridge Hardware color chrome hardware Tailpiece strings through-body tailpiece Fingerboard material rosewood fingerboard Fingerboard markers dot fingerboard position markers Neck joint bolt on neck Neck material maple neck Neck width 1.68 inches wide at nut Number of frets 22 fret Tuner layout six-in-a-row
Title: Epiphone Demon V * RARE E Series Electric Guitar With Case ! Rhoads /Jackson
